item.title: Planet Ventures is planning to raise $5 million CAD through convertible bond financing to increase its Bitcoin holdings
item.description: On July 23rd, according to @btcNLNico, Planet Ventures Inc intends to raise up to 5 million Canadian dollars through convertible debt financing in order to enhance its Bitcoin holdings.

item.title: USDC Treasury Burns 50.07 Million USDC on Ethereum Mainnet
item.description: On July 23rd, as monitored by WhaleAlert, 50.07 million USDC was burned in the USDC Treasury on the Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: If Bitcoin drops below $117,000, the mainstream CEX cumulative long liquidation intensity will reach $1.455 billion
item.description: On July 23rd, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin drops beneath $117,000, the cumulative long liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $1.455 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin rebounds above $119,000, the cumulative short liquidation strength of mainstream CEXs will merely be $181 million.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not disclose the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of the liquidated contracts. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring liquidation clusters, that is, strength.Therefore, the liquidation chart indicates to what extent the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it attains a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" implies that the price will exhibit a stronger reaction due to a liquidity avalanche when it reaches that level.

item.title: Institutional Ethereum Whale Holdings Change in the Last 30 Days: SharpLink Gaming Holds 360.8K ETH, Ranking First
item.description: On July 23rd, based on the data from Strategicethreserve, the following treasury companies and institutions have experienced significant changes in their Ethereum holdings within the past 30 days:SharpLink Gaming (SBET) takes the first place. It is currently holding 360,800 ETH, which is approximately worth $13.3 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 104.69%.Bitmine Immersion Tech (BMNR) ranks second. It is currently holding 300,700 ETH, with a value of approximately $11.1 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 84.29%.The Ethereum Foundation ranks third. It holds 238,500 ETH, which is approximately worth $8.792 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have decreased by 8.06%.Bit Digital (BTBT) ranks sixth. It holds 120,300 ETH, with a value of approximately $4.434 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 335.53%.BTCS Inc (BTCS) ranks tenth. It holds 55,800 ETH, with a value of approximately $2.056 billion. In

item.title: Huobi HTX will be listed on COOKIE (Cookie DAO) at 17:00 on July 24th, and COOKIE/USDT (10X) isolated margin trading will be simultaneously added.
item.description: On July 23rd, according to the announcement from Huobi HTX, Huobi HTX will commence the COOKIE deposit service at 17:30 (GMT+8) on July 23rd. The COOKIE/USDT spot trading will be launched at 17:00 (GMT+8) on July 24th. The COOKIE withdrawal service will be opened at 17:00 (GMT+8) on July 25th. Meanwhile, Huobi Futures will add the COOKIE/USDT (10X) isolated margin leverage trading at 17:00 (GMT+8) on July 24th.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Drops Below $18,000
item.description: On July 23rd, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin fell below $118,000, experiencing a 24-hour decline of 0.15%.

item.title: Arthur Hayes: Cryptopunks Next Cycle Will Outperform Ethereum
item.description: On July 23rd, Arthur Hayes, the co-founder of BitMEX, posted on the X platform, saying, "In terms of US dollars in this cycle, Cryptopunks will outperform ETH. Ethereum holders will show off with NFTs. This is a game of internet status. The entire world economy (excluding food and energy production) is essentially a game of status, and how could internet society be any different?"

item.title: Tether Discloses Partial Investment Portfolio: Has Invested in Over 120 Companies, with a Focus on Bitcoin, Payment, and Other Sectors
item.description: On July 23rd, Paolo Ardoino, the CEO of Tether, declared that Tether has now announced some of its investment/venture capital portfolio today. In total, Tether has made investments in over 120 companies, and this figure is anticipated to increase substantially in the forthcoming months and years. The invested companies encompass Juventus, Bitdeer, Crystal Intelligence, Rumble, Shiga Digital, and others.These investments all originate from Tether's own profits (projected to reach $13.7 billion by 2024) and do not involve the reserve assets of USDT (and other stablecoins). They fall under Tether's investment department. The emphasis is placed on key domains such as payment infrastructure, renewable energy, Bitcoin, agriculture, artificial intelligence, and tokenization.

item.title: Coinshares has obtained the EU MiCA License
item.description: On July 23rd, the cryptocurrency asset management service provider CoinShares declared that it had acquired a license regulated by the European Union's Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA). This license was granted by the French Financial Markets Authority (AMF) and encompassed CoinShares' existing licenses obtained under the EU's MiFID and AIFM directives. On the same day, the company's stock price increased by 1.7% to 120 Swedish Krona (approximately $12.66). From the beginning of the year until now, the company's stock price has risen by 46%.

item.title: LookOnChain: Binance Alpha Launches COA
item.description: July 23rd. Binance Alpha initiated the Alliance Games (COA).
